title: GDP per capita on Indian States (INR)
comments: Compared to the adjacent states, West Bengal is performing quite well.
I wouldn't consider turning the wealthiest state during the British rule to one of the poorest state as performing quite well.

It was wealtheist before British took over and then ruined it by sheer exploitation.

The reason being great patronage from the kings/nawabs/rich folks.

This patronage is what we now call subsidies.
If you cannot feed your own people, being rich means nothing.
